attributes.additional_details:
Nigel spent over 20 years pushing to leave the EU and without the Brexit party standing aside the govt. may not have won the last election with a resounding mandate to leave the EU.

He exposed EU corruption, waste and the levels of illegal immigration.

This govt. and country owe him the recognition he rightly deserves.
attributes.background:
Nigel Farage was the driving force behind the UK leaving the EU.

He deserves to be knighted.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
